findings.issue: Documentation uses long-form flags in examples, but short-form flags are available
findings.recommendation: Consider documenting short-form flags in 'Common Options' section for brevity. Example: 'jira-as dev branch-name PROJ-123 -p bugfix' or 'jira-as dev branch-name -p bugfix PROJ-123'
findings.impact: Users may not be aware of shorter flag syntax

findings.issue: Documentation uses long-form flags in examples, but short-form flags are available
findings.documented: jira-as dev parse-commits 'Fix PROJ-123 and OTHER-456' --project PROJ
findings.recommendation: Document short-form flag: 'jira-as dev parse-commits 'Fix PROJ-123 and OTHER-456' -p PROJ'
findings.impact: Users may not be aware of shorter flag syntax

findings.issue: Documentation uses long-form flags in examples, but short-form flags are available
findings.documented: jira-as dev link-commit PROJ-123 --commit abc123def --message 'feat: add login' --repo https://github.com/org/repo
findings.recommendation: Add example with short-form flags: 'jira-as dev link-commit PROJ-123 -c abc123def -m 'feat: add login' -r https://github.com/org/repo'
findings.impact: Users may not be aware of shorter flag syntax

findings.issue: Documentation uses long-form flags in examples, but short-form flags are available
findings.documented: jira-as dev link-pr PROJ-123 --pr https://github.com/org/repo/pull/456 --status merged --author 'Jane Doe'
findings.recommendation: Add example with short-form flags: 'jira-as dev link-pr PROJ-123 -p https://github.com/org/repo/pull/456 -s merged -a 'Jane Doe''
findings.impact: Users may not be aware of shorter flag syntax

findings.issue: Documentation does not mention short-form flag '-c' for --include-checklist
findings.recommendation: Note that --include-components does not have a short-form flag, while others do. Document this distinction.
findings.impact: Minor: Users may not know which flags have short-forms

findings.issue: Documentation example shows '--title' option, but SKILL.md does not mention this option in Common Options or command descriptions
findings.documented_example: jira-as dev link-pr PROJ-123 --pr https://github.com/org/repo/pull/456 --title 'Fix authentication bug'
findings.recommendation: Add --title option to documentation. Update example in line 119 to include this in the command description table.
findings.impact: Users may not discover the --title option for PR linking

findings.issue: Documentation claims 'MISSING_OPTION' for output formats, but all CLI outputs match documented formats
findings.recommendation: Documentation is accurate. No changes needed.

priority_2.title: Document short-form flags
priority_2.description: Add a section in 'Common Options' explaining that short-form flags are available for most options

priority_3.title: Add --title option to link-pr documentation
priority_3.description: The --title option for link-pr is documented in examples but not in the command description
files_to_update: skills/jira-dev/SKILL.md (add to command table or separate section)

priority_3.title: Enhance Common Options section
priority_3.description: Document that --include-components does not have a short-form flag while others do

conclusion.notes: Documentation is accurate and comprehensive. All 6 subcommands are documented with correct syntax. Minor improvements suggested for clarity and completeness regarding short-form flags. No critical issues found.
